trans-unit.source: An activity that receives a message.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> activity can receive a single item or multiple items depending on the type of receive content used.

When a workflow contains multiple <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> activities with the same operation name, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.CorrelatesOn%2A> property must be set to the same set of correlation queries.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value of the action header of the message.

If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.Action%2A> property is not explicitly set, its value defaults to: `https://tempuri.org/{service contract namespace}/{service contract name}/{operation name}`.
The action URI of the message.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a new workflow instance is created to process the message if the message does not correlate to an existing workflow instance..
If `true`, a new workflow instance is created to process the message if the message does not correlate with an existing workflow instance.
`true` if a new workflow instance is created to process the message, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the data to receive.
The content can be either a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveMessageContent"></xref> or a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent"></xref>.
The data to receive.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet"></xref> used to query the message to extract correlation data.
A set of message queries used to extract correlation data from the incoming message.
Gets or sets a correlation handle that is used to route the message to the appropriate workflow instance.
The correlation handle.

Gets a collection of correlation initializers that initialize query-based, context, callback context, or request-reply correlations with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send"></xref> activity runs.
A collection of correlation initializers.
Returns the receive activity from the given contract operation description.
The contract operation description.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref> object from the given contract operation description.
Gets a collection of known types for the operation.
This property should be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.
It is ignored if <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is used.
[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] known types, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

Known types specified in this property will be added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.KnownTypes%2A> collection of the corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> for this operation.
A collection of known types.
Gets or sets the name of the operation implemented by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.OperationName%2A> property is not set, an exception is thrown.

The operation name is used to construct the default value for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.Action%2A> property if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.Action%2A> property is not explicitly set.

<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.OperationName%2A> is the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> for this operation.
The name of the operation.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the protection level for the operation.
This property is set to one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> enumeration values.
The protection level for the operation.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the serializer to use for this operation.
The default serializer is the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.
The serializer to use.
Gets or sets the name of the service contract.
This property is used to group service operations into individual service contracts.

All <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> activities that have the same <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.ServiceContractName%2A> are grouped into the same service contract (WSDL PortType).
This property defaults to the name of the workflow service.
The service contract name.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.CorrelatesOn"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.CorrelatesOn"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
